reviewText: I couldn't find this anywhere until now. This is classic!

If you like to laugh until you hurt, then this is your video.
Though some of the content is an adult, Still it only adds to the humour.
Redd Foxx was the best and this tape proves it!
Peter
You have to love red fox with his old school humor... Sanford and son is funny but this video was hilarious..
I cannot get the DVD to play.  I emailed the seller, who will not respond.  I need to send the DVD back and get a replacement.  This was a birthday gift.

Redd Foxx was a comedic genius,whether it was on Sanford & Son or his adult oriented stand up performances such as this the guy was in a class of his own,in my opinion there will never be another one like him, I watch this at least 4 times a year, this is side splitting comedy, I wish it was officialy released on dvd even though I did transfer it from vhs to dvd I would still buy it, just make sure the kids are asleep when you have this one on.
I recently purchased this video, and I laughed all the way through it. Foxx was a classic comedian. I enjoyed listening to his jokes. This video is Not for Chirldren, but Adults will enjoy it.
I would like to see this video on DVD as soon as possible.
